title: 5E Learning Cycle-Based Elementary Science Instructional Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science basic concepts and foundational understanding of teaching practices
context.additional_context: Blended environment combining smartphone-based mobile learning and offline workshops. Corporate training conducted after work hours

learning_goals: Learners can design specific instructional strategies that apply each phase of the 5E Model (Engage-Explore-Explain-Elaborate-Evaluate) to elementary science lessons.
Learners can develop hybrid digital/analog science learning materials executable in a limited-technology environment (smartphone-centric).
Learners can complete field-applicable elementary science instructional designs through project-based assessment and incorporate peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
